summary:
One tough redguard female cMichonne ompanion to travel with, She can cut them down,
For TWD fans Michonne Companion
descriptionHtml:
Sultry Companion or
Updated (Companion Michonne) for TWD fans such as a few on the post for this mod gave me the idea of this follower looking close to Michonne. A huge thanks on the replies for her,
Note: If you are updating you can keep both however they will look the same and have a bit different run speed and different names.
With NMM you can download both and enable or dissable what ever version of her you like or dont.


For the Blades Single handed Sword that looks very close to Michonne's sword open the console command window and type: help blades then look for the sword and type in player.additem (the offsets) and number of how many swords (1) remember to put a space between the offsets of the wep and the quanity of item(s) needed.

One tough Female Redguard follower to join arms with through the world of skyrim.
She carries a Giant enchanted Glass greatsword with the traits of a battlemage.
She can heal and conjure the basic flame atronach, Frost.
New- Character has a open lvl so she can lvl up with you on your journey up to lvl 100
her speed is set at 125 to keep up the pace with you.

She is found at the (Sleeping Giant Inn) Riverwood.


[color=red]#Required[/color] mod for dreadlocks from ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

//Recomended Mods for Female characters and followers as listed,
(Great gear look for her) Seraphine Armor - CBBEv3 - UNPby BloodFree http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24723
The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722
DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709
Coverwomen by mrLenski http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563
-I used-
seamless UNP and Coverwomen Look_2
Sporty Sexy Sweat - wet body skin texture - CBBE UNP UNPB ADEC Vanilla by Xs2reality http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28946


Most important: Yes you can marry her =D
and No, She doesnt have Lydia's voice..
author: breakitup
